thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Cashing In: Why Cash Should Be in Your Portfolio Again

author: James Mackintosh
title: Cashing In: Why Cash Should Be in Your Portfolio Again
text:
Holding cash is investment heresy after a decade of the lowest interest rates in history. It is time to consider the sacrilegious, and add cash back into portfolios.
The value of cash was demonstrated in the first quarter: Both stocks and bonds lost money—the first quarter that’s happened since the aftermath of Lehman’s failure in 2008. Cash turned out to be the safe asset.
The...
